channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: OpenAI chief Sam Altman plans India visit as AI leaders converge in New Delhi: sources
item.description: Sam Altman is set for his first India visit in nearly a year.

item.title: Fortinet FortiGate devices hit in automated attacks which create rogue accounts and steal firewall data
item.description: A recent patch is apparently not working particularly well, and Fortinet is already working on another.

item.title: The end of the Sony era in TVs
item.description: There aren't many tech companies that can claim Sony's level of influence in how we live our lives. From the Walkman to the PlayStation to the Trinitron, Sony has been making excellent gadgets in multiple categories for decades, which makes this week's news just a little sad. Sony's new joint venture with TCL isn't the […]

item.title: Ce bug des smartphones Pixel est un cauchemar pour la vie privée
item.description: Quelques utilisateurs sont touchés par un problème très étrange. De quoi donner des sueurs froides chaque fois que quelqu'un vous appelle et que vous ne décrochez pas.

item.title: Cracking the AI code: realizing AI's true value in finance
item.description: AI's role in finance is evolving, and finance teams must now focus on delivering tangible results.

item.title: Raspberry Pi dégaine un nouveau produit, et ce n’est pas un PC
item.description: Loin est le temps de la simple petite carte PC à 40 dollars, Raspberry continue d'étendre son écosystème de produits. Cette fois, c'est une clé USB, et ce n'est pas sans intérêt.

item.title: Voici quand vous verrez encore plus de publicités sur l’App Store
item.description: Après avoir annoncé l'arrivée de publicités supplémentaires dans l'App Store, Apple dévoile quand nous y aurons droit.

item.title: Gaze Deeply Into Nature With These Award-Winning Ecology Photos
item.description: Winning shots from the Capturing Ecology competition highlight the complex relationships that shape ecosystems.

item.title: Epson EcoTank ET-4950 series review: I can’t find another mid-price printer so loaded with features and ink
item.description: Epson’s feature-packed 4-in-1 can even duplex scan.

item.title: Anbernic’s next wireless controller adds a screen and heart rate monitoring
item.description: Anbernic has announced its second wireless controller through a teaser video on YouTube highlighting its features. The company's first gamepad, the RG P01, offered features like Hall effect triggers and joysticks for just $18. Pricing for the new Anbernic RG G01 hasn't been revealed, but it may be more expensive due to several upgrades, including […]...

item.title: Les géants de la tech dépensent sans compter pour se mettre l’administration Trump dans la poche
item.description: Les grandes entreprises de la tech ont dépensé sans compter pour être dans les petits papiers de l'administration Trump. Les dépenses de lobbying ont été dévoilées et elles sont globalement en hausse. Meta, Amazon et Google ont été les plus dépensiers l'an dernier.

item.title: 1348: Ex Voto, an action game featuring a female knight on a quest to save Jennifer English in medieval Italy, sounds like just the game for me, and it's launching in March
item.description: Indie studio Sedleo and publisher Dear Villagers have announced that their medieval action-adventure game 1348: Ex Voto will launch on March 12, 2026, for PC and PS5.

item.title: « C’est extrêmement simple de le sortir pour shooter » : nous avons mis le Fujifilm X Half dans les mains de l’un de nos lecteurs [Sponso]
item.description: Tenté par l'effet vintage du Fujifilm X Half ? Ce petit boîtier au rendu argentique est proposé à 799 euros par le constructeur. Mais est-il fait pour vous ? Pour le savoir, nous l'avons confié à l'un de nos lecteurs.

item.title: 'We have initiated an immediate internal review': Asus responds to worries about AMD Ryzen 9800X3D CPUs dying in its motherboards
item.description: Following past issues with ASRock motherboards, we're now seeing an uptick in reports of problems with Asus boards.

item.title: Best Action Cameras (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Gearing up to shred the slopes or dive into the seas? These photography tools are made for danger.

item.title: Influencers are pushing suspicious peptides. How much are you willing to risk?
item.description: This is Optimizer, a weekly newsletter sent every Friday from Verge senior reviewer Victoria Song that dissects and discusses the latest gizmos and potions that swear they're going to change your life. Optimizer arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 10AM ET. Opt in for Optimizer here. On TikTok, it's disturbingly easy to find videos of […]

item.title: Only 1 week left (or until the first 500 passes are gone): The first TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 ticket discount is ending
item.description: Register now to save up to $680 on your TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 pass and get a second ticket at 50% off. This offer ends next week on January 30, or once the first 500 tickets are claimed — whichever comes first.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Saturday, January 24 (game #1461)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Saturday, January 24 (game #692)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Saturday, January 24 (game #958)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: Die My Love missing a best cinematography nod is the most outrageous 2026 Oscars snub — but Seamus McGarvey's starter camera kit is exactly what any budding filmmaker needs
item.description: I'm furious that Die My Love is missing from this year's Oscars lineup, but for cinematographer Seamus McGarvey, the magic is in 'how we look and feel, not what we use to shoot with'.

item.title: 7 new movies and TV shows to watch on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max, and more this weekend (January 23)
item.description: From anticipated new shows to the streaming debut of two movie biopics, here's what you'll want to watch this weekend.

item.title: Trois câbles sous-marins sabotés en Europe : la Finlande soupçonne la Russie
item.description: En quelques jours, trois câbles sous-marins ont été sectionnés en mer Baltique. Deux navires ont été identifiés comme étant potentiellement à l'origine des incidents, dont un cargo chargé d'acier russe. Les autorités redoutent une opération de sabotage en provenance de la Russie.

item.title: The human paradox at the center of modern cyber resilience
item.description: Human workers are key to preventing cyberattacks and operating alongside AI to enhance cyber resilience.

item.title: On a vu la première voiture électrique chinoise qui conduit seule à 120 km/h : la GAC Hyptec A800
item.description: On a pu monter à bord de la voiture électrique chinoise qui a obtenu la première licence locale pour conduite en autonomie à 120 km/h, la GAC Hyptec A800. Voici notre premier avis.

item.title: 14 of the best deals from the Amazon UK weekend sale – I've picked the top tech offers from £13.99
item.description: I've searched through this weekend's sale at Amazon UK and picked out 14 of the best tech offers that start from just £13.99.

item.title: L’une des meilleures enceintes portables connectées de chez Bose revient à un super prix pour les soldes
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver continuent et pour l'occasion Amazon lâche une belle offre pour une enceinte intelligente. La puissante et mobile Bose Portable Smart Speaker passe de 419 euros lors de son lancement à 239 euros.

item.title: Malaysia lifts ban on Grok after taking X at its word
item.description: After being one of the first countries in the world to block Elon Musk’s Grok chatbot, Malaysia has now lifted its ban. Along with Indonesia, the country moved swiftly to temporarily halt access to X's frequently controversial AI chatbot earlier this month, after multiple reports emerged of it being used to generate deepfake sexualized images of people, including women and children. At the time, the Malaysian Communications and Multimedia Commission (MCMC) said the restrictions would remain in place until X Corp and parent xAI could prove they had enforced the necessary safeguards against misu...

item.title: « Vers une hausse massive des prix » : pourquoi vous ne trouverez bientôt plus de GPU Nvidia au prix officiel
item.description: La notion de prix conseillé n'a décidément plus aucun sens alors que Nvidia aurait abandonné un programme incitant ses partenaires à le pratiquer.

item.title: AI labs wage a reputational knife fight at Davos
item.description: This is an excerpt of Sources by Alex Heath, a newsletter about AI and the tech industry, syndicated just for The Verge subscribers once a week. The leaders of the three preeminent frontier AI labs spent this week at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, taking shots at each other like candidates in a […]

item.title: Samsung a gaffé : l’énorme nouveauté écran du Galaxy S26 Ultra confirmée par erreur
item.description: Samsung a laissé apparaître un indice explicite sur une fonctionnalité très attendue de son prochain smartphone haut de gamme. Une capture publiée sur son propre site montre en effet la présence de l’« Affichage confidentiel » pour One UI 8.5.

item.title: Get the 512GB Samsung P9 microSD Express card for 33 percent off right now
item.description:
MicroSD Express cards are still a little hard to find, considering they're pretty new and only really started becoming popular last year once the Switch 2 came out. These upgraded versions of microSD cards are the only ones compatible with the Switch 2 for expanding its storage, so if you're already starting to feel the crunch on your console, it's worth picking one up. Samsung's P9 microSD Express card is on sale right now — you can grab the 512GB version of $80, which is 33 percent off and one of the best prices we've seen.
The P9 boasts transfer speeds of up to 800MB/s, making moving game...

item.title: Linux users targeted as crypto-stealing malware hits Snap packages - here's how to stay safe
item.description: There's a "relentless" campaign on the Ubuntu app store, and people are losing their crypto, experts warn.

item.title: Tesla finally kills Autopilot in a bid to boost FSD subscriptions
item.description: Tesla scrapped its Autopilot driver assist feature that used to come standard in new vehicles, as it attempts to steer customers to its newly subscription-only Full Self-Driving (FSD) system. According to Electrek, the company removed Basic Autopilot as a standard feature from new Model 3 and Model Y vehicles in North America. That means in […]

item.title: Quel forfait mobile pour le Japon ? Nos conseils pour communiquer et rester connecté
item.description: Vous avez prévu un voyage au Japon, mais vous souhaitez savoir comment vous allez pouvoir communiquer avec vos proches restés en France sans en payer le prix fort ? Voici les meilleurs forfaits pour le Japon.

item.title: This reduction would 'offset the initial cost of the device': New research argues for health services giving out Apple Watches to patients for free — here's why
item.description: Science confirms what we knew all along: smartwatches are literal lifesavers.

item.title: Gemini peut désormais vraiment vous aider à réviser le bac
item.description: Google n'en finit plus d'ajouter des fonctions à son IA Gemini. Bien consciente que ChatGPT est très utilisé pour les révisions, la firme propose désormais un mode spécial pour Gemini.

item.title: Le Tesla Model Y vient de s’améliorer : voici ce qui change (et ce qu’il manque encore)
item.description: Ce n'était qu'une question de temps : après la Chine et les États-Unis, le Tesla Model Y s'améliore subtilement en Europe, notamment en qualité perçue. Dommage : les versions 7 places et les nouvelles batteries, dont l'arrivée semble imminente, manquent à l'appel.

item.title: Soldes montres connectées : les 14 promotions pour être à l’heure à ses séances de sport ! Voici notre top des meilleurs bons plans
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver permettent de faire de bonnes affaires sur de nombreux produits Tech, dont les montres connectées ! Ces accessoires lifestyle & sport profitent eux aussi d’une vague de promotions : voici les offres à retenir.

item.title: Apple pourrait dévoiler très rapidement de nouveaux MacBook Pro
item.description: Apple prépare très certainement de nouveaux MacBook Pro. Le constructeur organise non pas une keynote, mais une « Apple Experience » la semaine prochaine, durant laquelle seront conviés des créateurs. Un moment idéal pour leur présenter le nouvel abonnement Creator Studio… et pourquoi pas des portables inédits.

item.title: Le Galaxy S26 Ultra pourrait bien signer l’arrêt de mort des protections d’écran
item.description: Vous faites partie de ceux qui passent dix minutes à chasser la moindre bulle d'air sous un film plastique hors de prix ? Samsung pourrait bientôt rendre ce rituel obsolète avec le Galaxy S26 Ultra, dont les nouvelles technologies d'affichage promettent d’énerver les fabricants d'accessoires.

item.title: One Familiar Face Isn’t Back for ‘The Mummy 4’ Yet
item.description: Plus, somehow 'Primitive War' returned, and is bringing 'secret Cold War agendas' with it.

item.title: Comment transférer une eSIM entre deux smartphones ?
item.description: L'eSIM est aujourd'hui disponible auprès des quatre grands opérateurs et de quelques opérateurs virtuels. Si elle est pratique à installer, son transfert d'un smartphone à l'autre n'est pas forcément évident. La démarche n'est pourtant pas compliquée une fois qu'on la connaît, d'où ce guide.

item.title: How to watch NBA live streams online for free
item.description: How to watch NBA for free. Live stream NBA games for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: The Best Paper Notebooks and Journals, Tested and Reviewed (2026): Leuchttherm, Midori, Field Notes
item.description: Celebrate National Handwriting Day (I did not make that up) with new notebooks, a journal, or sketchbooks.

item.title: Spartacus: House of Ashur episode 8 reveals the most distressing gladiator death in the Starz show to date — and its cast 'felt completely shaken' after filming
item.description: The final scene of a Spartacus: House of Ashur episode is always a shocker, but episode 8 is the most deeply upsetting yet... even for its cast.

item.title: What is the release date for A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms episode 2 on HBO Max?
item.description: Find out when and where you can watch episode 2 of A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms.

item.title: Samsung Bespoke Fridge with AI review: All the bells and whistles
item.description: At their core, refrigerators are relatively simple devices. If you're the type of person to view every extra feature as a component that could potentially go wrong, basic iceboxes are probably the kind you go for. But for those on the other end of the spectrum, Samsung's latest Bespoke Refrigerators with AI inside have more bells and whistles than you might think possible — including an optional 32-inch screen. Editor's note: The model we tested for this review came out in the second half of 2025 and will continue to be on sale throughout 2026. Hardware will remain the same, the only changes w...

item.title: Ring can now verify if a video has been altered
item.description: Ring has launched a new tool that can tell you if a video clip captured by its camera has been altered or not. The company says that every video downloaded from Ring starting in December 2025 going forward will come with a digital security seal. “Think of it like the tamper-evident seal on a medicine bottle,” it explained. Its new tool, called Ring Verify, can tell you if a video has been altered in any way. Even adjusting a video clip’s brightness or trimming a few seconds off will break that seal, and the tool will tell you that it cannot be verified. All you have to do is visit the tool’s w...

item.title: Minnesota economic blackout: List of stores closed today, schedule of events, where to donate as anti-ICE protest kicks off
item.description: Hundreds of businesses across the state are closing their doors on January 23 for the Day of Truth and Freedom. Minnesota continues to be the beating heart of nationwide anti-ICE movements with The Day of Truth and Freedom. Today, January 23, hundreds of businesses across the state are closing their doors in protest after community groups, faith-based organizations, and unions came together to call for an “economic blackout.” ...

item.title: Professor Reports That OpenAI Deleted His Work, World Laughs in His Face
item.description: "Amazing sob story: 'ChatGPT deleted all the work I hadn't done.'"

item.title: TurboTax Deluxe is on sale for only $45 ahead of tax season
item.description: With the spring approaching, it's time to start thinking about how you'll file your taxes. Unfortunately, with the recent demise of Direct File, there isn't a free, government-provided alternative to TurboTax in 2026, and you'll need to look to other federal programs, including IRS Free File, to file your paperwork. If you don't qualify for Free File, chances are you'll need to dish out cash for Intuit's software. And while we hate to suggest you give money to a company that has spent decades lobbying to ensure America's tax system remains a nightmare, we can at least save you some money if Tu...

item.title: Il est encore temps d’acheter un puissant laptop sous RTX 5070 + 32 Go de RAM à bon prix pendant les soldes
item.description: En ce moment, vous avez le PC portable gaming Lenovo Legion 5 15IRX10 pour 1 299,99 euros alors qu'il était proposé à 1 799,99 euros à sa sortie. Il y a déjà eu moins cher, mais ça reste un très bon prix compte tenu de la pénurie des composants.

item.title: 3 things to know about Trump’s ‘Golden Dome’ and Greenland’s role in nuclear defense
item.description: Trump says U.S. ownership of Greenland is crucial for his ‘Golden Dome’ missile defense system. In a hypothetical nuclear war involving Russia, China and the United States, the island of Greenland would be in the middle of Armageddon.The strategic importance of the Arctic territory — under the flight paths that nuclear-armed missiles from China and Russia could take on their way to incinerating targets in the United States, and vice versa — is one of the reasons U.S. President Donald Trump has cited in his disruptive campaign to wrest control of Greenland from Denmark, alarming Greenlanders an...
